trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir exibe um formulário que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controle que exibe um ano.

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting properties like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo demonstra como definir propriedades como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> para personalizar a aparência do controle de calendário.

trans-unit.source: Other properties like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bolded.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> são definidos para personalizar quais datas estão em negrito.

trans-unit.source: The example also sets properties to change the calendar format, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também define propriedades para alterar o formato de calendário, incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> eventos também são manipulados e seu status é exibido no formulário.
